title: [Medicine] Llama and camel antibodies have been shown to neutralize SARS-CoV-2, but their production is challenging. Now scientists at EMBL have identified synthetic versions which bind to and neutralize the virus.

[Health] Survey on the impact COVID-19 has had on researchers: Many expressed that policy makers had not taken scientific advice into account to mitigate the pandemic, and they fear that funding will be affected negatively after the pandemic
